Title: Enacts the permit predictability act
Summary: Requires the planning board or other administrative body of a town, village or city authorized to designate, review and approve, approve with modifications, or disapprove site plans to develop a standardized form containing all requirements for such site plan review applications; makes related provisions.
LawCode: Amd ยง274-a, Town L; amd ยง7-725-a, Vil L; amd ยง27-a, Gen City L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the town law, the village law and the general city law, in relation to enacting the "permit predictability act"
